title: GG to the ZZ
body: That new item is pretty neat if i do say so myself

replies.body: I wrote a post about it when the item first hit the pbe and got down voted into oblivion. The community asked for this. Now they must deal with it

They probably want it mostly because of how OP it seems. Wait about another week until everyone realizes that everyone ELSE can also buy it, and they'll either ask for perm nerds or simply not care anymore.

P.S. Hydra counters this item so hard.
That's.. pretty scary. Your team got dominated, but won with five Zz portals. Ouch.

That item should not exist ever. 

Riot is just tampering with how drunk they are.

> [{quoted}](name=SouL1ess,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=brtpRFkE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-16T04:48:09.476+0000)
>
> That item should not exist ever. 
> 
> Riot is just tampering with how drunk they are.

Get it on Nasus. Split two lanes at once. Win game.

I know you're trolling, but I still have to say it...
Why get zz on Nasus when he can take the turret in no time as is?  It fills up an item slot he can use on a much better item that could serve a much better purpose.

> [{quoted}](name=ChrisB5,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=brtpRFkE,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2015-01-17T02:09:46.823+0000)
>
> I know you're trolling, but I still have to say it...
> Why get zz on Nasus when he can take the turret in no time as is?  It fills up an item slot he can use on a much better item that could serve a much better purpose.

zz is really only good on tank supports. I wouldn't get it on Nasus normally, but I could see it working in certain situations.

Such as?  I honestly thought you were joking.

I definitely agree with your first sentence though.  I was essentially forced into a pure tank role as Cho, which made me useless when we made it to the towers!  My solution?  ZZ let me build tankier, while still being able to help take down inhib and towers!  It was nice to be able to do this, and they made for a great distraction when I needed to make my escape.  But for Nasus, I just can't see any situation where this could be useful.
well it can tank turrets so that's always a plus(and i think it counts as a minions so backdooring is much easier without the extra armor the turrets have).

The lifespan is super short and it pushes the lane. It eventually gets to a point where all of the voidlings die before they make it from where you traveled to the frontline unless you place it next to the enemy turret or the enemy is pushing back.
i just found it funny that no matter how fed and how much they destroyed us in teamfights... aslong as we ran around in circles long enough the void minions destroyed everything

Imagine if {{champion:90}} can install his voidlings into the portal to "seduce" more voidlings and double the numbers and size of those in the gate.

Also, {{champion:38}}  can convert one gate every 2 minute to his side.
Role play at it's best
Malz with Zz'Rot after RoA is pretty effective
That is outplay at its best.
Zz'Rot portal isn't OP. It's just people don't know how to deal with it yet. Give it a week or so and if it is still dominating, THEN we can look at it.
the enemy team had no waveclear apart from Lulu :p

I was wondering how this item would be if everyone built it. I wanted to test it on Nautilus as a jungle tank, since he doesn't have much AD this would help with split pushing. Plus you can put one down in a lane to help push it out and then focus more on other lanes

is it safe to say dragon times 5 plus 5 ZZ means no chance in heck of losing?
i mean as long as you can aa minions it seems like auto lose for the other team
THat's what i'm saying.. that item is pretty neat... i mean it does take a slight amount of skill to pull off.. if you rush Zz'rot you'll be behind in teamfights unless you're playing a full tank
I'm seriously wondering if it's even worth playing until they get rid of that BS lol
League of {{item:3512}} , such as League of  {{item:3071}} at s3?
new meta: mid or akf and ZZzzZZzzZZzzZZzzZzzZZzzZZzz
